TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_laluma'an_nu_Takelian, title = laluma'an_nu_Takelian, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/laluma'an_nu_Takelian} }

S.FORM: laluma'an nu Takelian (Amilika: House Targaryen) u nisangaan ku dadiw nu sulda atu lamal nu misulitay ci George Raymond Richard Martin, u caay katenga a laluma'an. i Kingslanding atu Ba'tu nu Liw a subalmana'nel ku laluma'an nu Takelian, mikeliday tu Wiestros a lala' tu tuluway a lasubu a mihcaan. u kulit nu laluma'ana nu Takelian hananay, u situluway a tangagh a liw; u Ekun atu tusaay a sabana nu nida hananay. u kamu nu laluma'an: u lamal atu idang (izang). (Amikika a kamu: Fire and Blood.) laylay, lalangawan ata micidekay caay kaw u mana'nelay ku laluma'an nu Takelian; namakay nu waliyan i Baleyliya Eysos a tabakiay a lala' inaayaw, inuayaw a 12 a mihcaan satu nikalawpesan nu Baleyliya, namakatengil ci Inal Takelian tu naspi nu wawana nida, mulady tu laluma'an amin atu limaay a Liw patayda i Ba'tuan nu Liw a subal. inudikudan tu nikalawpesan ku cacay a mihcaan hananay sa, u madademecay ci Ekun ku saayaway, muladay tu hitay atu tuluway a Liw tayda i Kingslanding, malingatu tu mingangayawan tu pituway a kanatalay. caay kelecad ku laluma'an nu Takelian tu zumaay a laluma'an i Westeros hananay, mitengil tu nikamuwan ulic nu babalaki: malacawa ku lalumaan, calkakaan; maaepun tu kina caay kalecad a nikaulican. izaw(idaw) ku kamu tu nikasalunhanay nu laluma'an nu Takelian hananay: "caay kau tademaw a salunganay." izaw (idaw) ku micidekay nu heni hananay sa, namakayni pitudus nu babalakian malik tu calkakaan u katuuday nu dadiw nu sulda atu lamal. Pasaylis Tanilis sasaydan a Eymun Pulintun Leywen Ekun u katuuday a laluma'an nu laylay zumaay a nikatinengan "权力的游戏" ISBN 7-5366-7125-3 "列王的纷争" ISBN 978-7-5366-7425-7 "冰雨的风暴" ISBN 978-7-5366-8484-3 "群鸦的盛宴" ISBN 978-7-5366-9933-5 "魔龙的狂舞"ISBN 7-229-05888-3 " " malalitin tu ihekaay atu zumaay a natinengan 喬治馬丁個人網站

laloma'an no Takelian (Amilika: Hoose Targaryen) o nisangaan ko dadiw no solda ato lamal no misolitay ci George Raymond Richard Martin, o caay katenga a laloma'an. i Kingslanding ato Ba'to no Liw a sobalmana'nel ko laloma'an no Takelian, mikeliday to Wiestros a lala' to toloway a lasobo a mihcaan. o kolit no laloma'ana no Takelian hananay, o sitoloway a tangagh a liw; o Ekon ato tosaay a sabana no nida hananay. o kamo no laloma'an: o lamal ato idang (izang). (Amikika a kamo: Fire and Blood.) laylay, lalangawan ata micidekay caay kaw o mana'nelay ko laloma'an no Takelian; namakay no waliyan i Baleyliya Eysos a tabakiay a lala' inaayaw, inoayaw a 12 a mihcaan sato nikalawpesan no Baleyliya, namakatengil ci Inal Takelian to naspi no wawana nida, molady to laloma'an amin ato limaay a Liw patayda i Ba'toan no Liw a sobal. inodikodan to nikalawpesan ko cacay a mihcaan hananay sa, o madademecay ci Ekon ko saayaway, moladay to hitay ato toloway a Liw tayda i Kingslanding, malingato to mingangayawan to pitoway a kanatalay. caay kelecad ko laloma'an no Takelian to zomaay a laloma'an i Westeros hananay, mitengil to nikamowan olic no babalaki: malacawa ko lalomaan, calkakaan; maaepon to kina caay kalecad a nikaolican. izaw(idaw) ko kamo to nikasalonhanay no laloma'an no Takelian hananay: "caay kao tademaw a salonganay." izaw (idaw) ko micidekay no heni hananay sa, namakayni pitodos no babalakian malik to calkakaan o katooday no dadiw no solda ato lamal. Pasaylis Tanilis sasaydan a Eymon Polinton Leywen Ekon o katooday a laloma'an no laylay zomaay a nikatinengan "权力的游戏" ISBN 7-5366-7125-3 "列王的纷争" ISBN 978-7-5366-7425-7 "冰雨的风暴" ISBN 978-7-5366-8484-3 "群鸦的盛宴" ISBN 978-7-5366-9933-5 "魔龙的狂舞"ISBN 7-229-05888-3 " " malalitin to ihekaay ato zomaay a natinengan 喬治馬丁個人網站
